arts.ttl: West Ham United v Burnley | Lineup, goals, score predictions
arts.sum: PREDICTING Nuno Espirito Santo’s side to start against Burnley should be simple: In essence, there won’t be a Hammers fan who doesn’t hope and expect the starting eleven to be the same as in last weeks successful performance against Newcastle United. However rumours of a Callum Wilson injury are something of a cloud on the […] Source

arts.ttl: West Ham United vs Burnley – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: West Ham United host Burnley on Saturday in their first home match since securing a vital 3-1 win over Newcastle United. That victory was their first of the season at the London Stadium. It also ended a damaging six-game winless run. Now, Nuno Espírito Santo is aiming to guide his side to back-to-back league wins […] The post West Ham United vs Burnley – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Burnley XI vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Burnley travel to the London Stadium today for a crucial six-pointer against 18th-placed West Ham United. The Clarets currently sit just one place above their opponents. Therefore, a victory would provide a significant boost to their hopes for survival. arts.ttl: West Ham United vs Burnley – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: West Ham United are aiming for back-to-back Premier League wins for the first time since February. They host Burnley today in a crucial battle at the foot of the table. This match pits the Hammers, who sit 18th, against a Burnley side just one place above them.
